tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE nano_particles (
   particle_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   particle_name VARCHAR(50),
   size FLOAT,
   growth_rate FLOAT,
   measurement_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE nano_particles ( 
  id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  particle_name TEXT, 
  size FLOAT, 
  growth_rate FLOAT, 
  created_at TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE ParticleAnalysis ( 
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  particle_id INT, 
  researcher_id INT, 
  analysis_date DATE, 
  result VARCHAR(255), 
  FOREIGN KEY (particle_id) REFERENCES NanoParticles(particle_id), 
  FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES ParticleResearcher(researcher_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE Experiment (
    experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    particle_id INT,
    researcher_id INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (particle_id) REFERENCES Particle(particle_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researcher(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ExperimentLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_date DATE NOT NULL,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  apparatus_id INT NOT NULL,
  particle_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (particle_id) REFERENCES NanoParticles(particle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Experiments (
  experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_date DATE NOT NULL,
  apparatus_id INT NOT NULL,
  researcher_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id)
);
